text:
It’s everyone's favorite time of year on Capitol Hill! And no – I don’t mean summer.  

Join us tomorrow morning for the CITI markup of the FY2023 NDAA. https://t.co/97GzR25BYB

It cost more than $70 to fill a gas tank this weekend. That is unacceptable. 

Rhode Islanders are hurting, which is why I’m fighting to crack down on Big Oil’s price gouging and  excess profits.  

https://t.co/wxizuL9pyT

Thanks for having me! There are few things I love more than talking cyber policy with other cyber wonks.  

Listen to our conversation now ⬇️ https://t.co/eY3ucOcJmq

On this, @Sen_JoeManchin has it right.  

There is no reason that an 18-year-old civilian – like the shooters in Uvalde and Buffalo – needs a weapon of war that fires nearly 50 rounds per minute.  

https://t.co/s8BKmrL1c6

This weekend, I had the privilege of joining @SECNAV, @GDElectricBoat, and my congressional colleagues for the keel laying of the USS District of Columbia. 

She will be a fierce addition to the @USNavy's fleet, and we wish her a long and storied career at sea. https://t.co/HV3vFrUgxY

Rhode Island needs more affordable housing. 

We’re making progress by breaking ground at the Arctic Mills, which will house 136 families at affordable rates. 

This project is an example of what's possible when government and business partner to get things done for the people. https://t.co/j1RfEjPWUa

Our national security depends on our capacity to set responsible norms in cyberspace.

I have full confidence in @NCFick’s ability to lead @StateCDP, where he will be tasked with coordinating cyber diplomacy with our allies.

I urge the Senate to swiftly confirm his nomination.

On June 6, 1944 — D-Day — thousands of Allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy to continue the liberation of Europe from the Nazis. 

Nearly eight decades later, we honor those who fought for freedom that day. We will never forget their bravery. https://t.co/n17CrVNjU9

It was another weekend of gun violence in America.

People were killed in mass shootings in Philadelphia, Phoenix, Chattanooga, and Summerton.

Congress MUST act to pass universal background checks, red flag laws, and a ban on assault weapons.

We can't go on like this.

Happy birthday, @FLOTUS!  

Thank you for all the work you do to make our country a better place. https://t.co/68HyNPBBVS

To protect our kids, we need to: 
1⃣ Get assault rifles off our streets 
2⃣ Close the background check loopholes 
3⃣ Pass "red flag" laws  

There is no reason it should be this hard to #EndGunViolence.

This year alone, there have already been over 200 mass shootings in the United States.

Today, we #WearOrange to honor the victims of gun violence and reaffirm our commitment to making our country safer for every American. 

Enough is enough. https://t.co/OokOR4eP65

Last weekend, I had the pleasure of joining the @USNavy for the commissioning of the USS Oregon!  

As co-chair of the Congressional Submarine Caucus, I am thrilled to see this newest warship join the Navy's fleet. https://t.co/qY710JOznV

These students are our future. 

But for now, they should just get to be kids. It’s on us to do right by them.  

Let’s meet the moment. 

https://t.co/lBJDm1h46J

It is unconscionable that the Iranian government would target sick children and the hard-working medical teams who care for them.  

I am grateful that the @FBI was able to thwart this attempt. 

https://t.co/KDtbt7Ya4V

Four more Americans are dead. This time in Tulsa. They were gunned down while trying to see their doctors.  

We can’t go on like this. It’s time to get weapons of war off our streets.  

I’ll be voting yes.  

https://t.co/No0FwAOyfK

As top oil companies rake in record profits, I'm fighting to rein in corporate greed. 

➡️Exxon Mobil -- Doubled last year's profits  
➡️Chevron -- Highest quarterly profit in 10 years  
➡️Shell -- Highest quarterly profit ever  

We've got to give families a break at the pump.

Wishing a safe deployment and a speedy return home for this @RINationalGuard company! 

Godspeed, soldiers. 
 https://t.co/ENNep6UWau

LGBTQ+ rights are human rights. Always.  

Happy Pride Month, Rhode Island! https://t.co/MwWUbRpOvP
